this essay , from the diaspora literature and Gao Jialin's tragedy in Life by Lu Yao , studies the diaspora literature of mainland China .本文通过对流散文学的关注以及高加林悲剧人生的介绍，引出了我们对大陆流散文学的研究。

entry.def: People who come from a particular nation, or whose ancestors came from it, but who now live in many different parts of the world are sometimes referred to as the diaspora .

example.ex: ...the history of peoples from the African diaspora.

means.word_mean: 1. the body of Jews (or Jewish communities) outside Palestine or modern Israel
2. the dispersion or spreading of something that was originally localized (as a people or language or culture)
